ComicInfo.Summary:
With great power comes great destruction! Titan's rampaging through Golden City like a freight train out of Hell, with an unstoppable ego and an attitude to match. He leaves the Catalyst team members licking their wounds and goes after his real target: Grace. All he wants is her surrender, but it looks like he'll have to kill her to get it! Hurt, nearly beaten, and her teleportation diamonds useless against him, Grace is out of ideas and out of time!Â Or is she?
